general_info.summary: This document lists various programs and departments within Sharda University, including its Schools of Dental, Medical, and Nursing Sciences. It covers academic and administrative aspects such as examination reports, fee structures, scholarships, student services like counseling and skill enhancement, and university-specific initiatives like FM radio and a mentoring portal. The content also touches upon university governance, legal frameworks, and global outreach.

career_path.summary: This text outlines career paths available after completing a pharmacy-related course, specifically mentioning Food and Drug Inspector and Regulatory Affairs Officer. It encourages individuals to pursue a career in pharmacy.
career_path.raw_content:
